story: You are in your home base in the rafters of the mall. This high ground keeps you safe from the zombies while you sleep.
nav: Press 1 to go to the antiques shop, Press 2 to go to the bowling alley, Press 3 to go to the shoe store

story: Welcome to the Antique shop! There are a lot of interesting, sharp, and dangerous items in here� cool.
nav: Press 1 to go home, Press 2 to go to the Fishing Store, Press 3 to go to the Lingerie Store

story: You've made it to the bowling alley. It's dark and even creepier than usual.
nav: Press 1 to go home, Press 2 to go to the costume store, Press 3 to go to the school supplies store

story: Welcome to the fishing store. On the wall, there's a huge plastic fish hanging with his mouth gaping wide open.
nav: Press 1 to go to the ski shop, Press 2 to go to the LCBO, Press 3 to go to Home Depot

story: This costume store seems picked clean. What could other survivors have even wanted to scavenge here? Weird. Oh wait! You just had an idea. There is one last palette of costume makeup sitting open in the corner. You use this to cover up your entire face, and now you kind of look like one of those brain eaters out there. Maybe this will help you hide from them more easily.
nav: Press 1 to go to the gun shop, Press 2 to go the camping store, Press 3 to go to the thrift shop

story: Unfortunately, I do not think you will find anything to help your survival here! Wait a minute, there is a trap door you did not see before. Would you like to risk it and check it out?
nav: Press 1 for hidden door, Press 2 to go back to the antique store where you know it is safe

story: Ah yes the shoe store. Your favourite store. Is that a pair of the Air Jordan 1 Hi FlyEase? No way! They're in your size too! It's not just about fashion, you know. They could help you run really quickly from those zombies.
nav: Press 1 to go to the clothing store, Press 2 to go to the CAA, Press 3 to go to a Rolex store

story: You are in the school supplies store! Be quick in here, I heard that zombie kids are super vicious!
nav: Press 1 to go to the book store, Press 2 to go to the pet store, Press 3 to go to the bowling alley

story: Oh no. You got too drunk and got eaten by a zombie.
You are in the clothing store. It's been a while since you've had a new outfit.
nav: Press 1 to go to the perfume shop, Press 2 to go the pharmacy

story: You go to the apple store looking for an apple watch for it's built-in compass. Except you forgot that there is no more electricity to charge it.
nav: Press 1 to go to the CAA, Press 2 to go to Circle K

story: You've arrived in the camping store. You hear some shuffling in the corner. Oh no� oh wait. That's not a zombie. That's a regular dude. And he's getting the last thermal blanket.
nav: Press 1 to go to the shoe store

story: Welcome to Mastermind! Where all your childhood dreams come true. Should you grab a game to entertain yourself with later?
nav: Press 1 to go to the lingerie, Press 2 to go to shoe store

story: You are in the perfume shop. Oh my! All the scents are overpowering.
nav: Press 1 to go to the antique store

story: Ski resorts are not open! All the liftys were turned into zombies.
nav: Press 1 to go back to the fishing store

story: Welcome to the book store. The smell is the same as it's always been. Reminds you of a time when you had time to read. The good ol' days.
nav: Press 1 to go to the thrift shop

story: Circle K wasn�t very exciting before this apocolyse.
nav: Press 1 to the Rolex store, Press 2 to the antique store

story: You made it to your sidekicks favourite store!
nav: Press 1 to go back to the school supplies store,

story: Welcome to Rolex. Talk about luxury. You've always wanted a Rolex but you couldn't afford one before the zombies came.
nav: Press 1 to go to your home base, Press 2 to go to the LCBO, Press 3 to go to the Circle K

story: You're in the thrift store. Weird choice when you could take literally anything, unused, from any other store. But hey, to each their own.
nav: Press 1 to go to the costume store,

story: You're in the CAA store. To the left, there are a bunch of airplane pillows. To the right, you can see a stand full of maps of different parts of the world. Maybe they'll have one of the city to help you navigate once you're out.
nav: Press 1 to go to Mastermind, Press 2 to go to the Apple store, Press 3 to go back to the shoe store

story: You enter Home Depot and are shocked at how many zombie killing tools are here. It's like Christmas morning!
nav: Press 1 to go to the costume store, Press 2 to go to the camping store

story: Oh no! You got shot dead by another survivor. Turns out the green face makeup wasn�t the best idea. GAME OVER!
You made it to the pharmacy! There may be some medical products that can help you if you get injured. That or you turn into a zombie, either way.
nav: Press 1 to go to Mastermind, Press 2 to go to the thrift shop

story: You have made the right choice! This secret door lead you to the tunnel! You thought it was a myth all this time, congrats! You will follow this tunnel till you reach civilization. There is a population of humans behind a wall  waiting to rescue survivors. Enjoy freedom!
